sentence.Network_en: Get on with life and don't sit back and mope.
sentence.Network_cn: 活跃一些享受生活，不要闲呆着闷闷不乐的。

sentence.Network_en: He is no mope, only thoughtful and quiet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不是那种忧郁的人, 只是好思考,不多说话.

sentence.Network_en: Was there any use buying Dilcey if she was going to mope about the child?
sentence.Network_cn: 只买来迪尔茜,要是她整天惦记孩子,又有什么用?

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (the early noun sense being 'fool or simpleton'): perhaps of Scandinavian origin; compare with Swedish dialect mopa 'to sulk'

entry.tran: 感到沮丧;闷闷不乐;百无聊赖
entry.def: If you mope, you feel miserable and do not feel interested in doing anything.

example.ex: Get on with life and don't sit back and mope.
example.tran: 活跃一些享受生活，不要闲呆着闷闷不乐的。

auth_sentence.content: We need to crack on rather than mope about.
auth_sentence.res_content: We need to crack on rather than mope about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We need to crack on rather than mope about.

auth_sentence.content: Get out into the open. Don't mope around.
auth_sentence.res_content: Get out into the open. Don't mope around.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Get out into the open. Don't mope around.

auth_sentence.content: Develop a daily routine so you have less time to mope.
auth_sentence.res_content: Develop a daily routine so you have less time to mope.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Develop a daily routine so you have less time to mope.

sentences.en: He moped about because he wasn’t invited to the party.
sentences.cn: 他闷闷不乐地徘徊,因为没有人请他去参加聚会。

sentences.en: He’s been moping about all day.
sentences.cn: 他百无聊赖地转悠了一整天。

sentences.en: You spend too much time moping around the house.
